programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E06, In Missouri, a part-time missionary is convicted, 38 years later, of killing her 5-year-old stepdaughter, and the skeleton of a Michigan boy, dead for 10 years, leads police to a serial killer.

programme.title: Traces Of Murder/The Bathtub Killer
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E09, A killer helps convict himself when he boasts about his crime to prison cellmates; and New Hampshire investigators probing the murder of a pregnant woman found raped, strangled, and dumped into her bathtub, get a new lead.

programme.title: Killer On The Strip/The Doll Murder
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E11, In 1989, socialite Susan Doll was found beaten, raped, and strangled in Colorado.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E14, In Wisconsin, advances in forensic clay modeling help investigators identify a murder victim whose skin was stripped from her head, neck, and legs. And in California, police track down two boys who enjoy satanic rituals and setting fires.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E15, Police solve a murder when divers find a skeleton in a car at the bottom of a river, and a dead dog's DNA helps crack open a 6-year-old case.

programme.title: In The Care Of A Killer/Deadly Lies
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E30, The suspicious death of 2-year-old Billy Blankenship is solved when police force his babysitter to re-enact the circumstances of his death. Then, a murder case is solved when the dead man's body is accidentally found by divers.

programme.title: The Widow And The Wolf/Texas Drifter
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E04, After the murder of her aunt goes cold, a woman helps launch an advocate group that brings awareness to cases that have gone unsolved.

programme.title: Family Secret/Justice Delayed
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E05, Forty-one years after the crime, a woman implicates her brother and cousin in the murder of a policeman.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E07, A woman's fall from a cliff in the Grand Canyon leads police to uncover a series of grisly murders, and investigators smoke out a killer when they find crucial DNA evidence on his cigarette butts.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E10, Klan leader Sam Bowers goes on trial for ordering the murder of an African-American storeowner 32 years prior, and investigators reopen the unsolved case of an African-American truck driver who was forced to leap to his death from a bridge by Klan member

programme.title: The Cuff Link/The Unluckiest Man
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E11, Police solve an old murder case with a painstaking examination of the tool mark on the plastic flex cuff that bound the victim's hands, and a 15-year-old murder case is finally cracked open.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E13, Police reopen a rape-murder case 25 years after the crime and find enough DNA evidence to bring him to justice. And a confession made to a "Baywatch" TV star helps police solve the three-year-old riddle of a wealthy Newport Beach woman's murder.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E14, It takes nine years and the work of cutting-edge forensic toxicologists to solve the murder of a medical examiner's wife. Then, a determined Alabama sheriff reopens the case of the deaths of two babies, hoping to get their mother to confess.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E15, Fire investigator Jack Malooly helps crack the case of an arsonist and killer who set fires to collect insurance money, and a prison inmate tells a detective that he can't help him with his current investigation, but knows about a 15-year-old murder.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E16, A police investigator discovers a letter written 16 years earlier that provides clues to a woman's murder. And a firearms expert supplies the evidence that South Carolina authorities need to put a man on trial in 2002 for a murder committed in 1961.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E18, New DNA technology and the national DNA databank help police hunt down a rapist-killer 11 years after he committed his crimes, and a detective's painstaking recreation of a woman's shooting death proves it wasn't an accident.

programme.title: The Touch of Satan
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Touch of Satan, S09E08, An aimless young man encounters a rural family that seems to have some secrets.
MST3K: Parts: The Clonus Horror, 19970607000000 +0000, Scientists run a clone farm for VIPs while Pearl and her goons are forced into babysitting omnipotent Space Children.

MST3K: Tormented, 19920926000000 +0000, In Tormented, jazz pianist Tom Stewart, soon to marry the woman he loves, watches former love Vi Mason fall from a lighthouse and does not save her. Vi’s spirit returns and begins to torment Tom at his every step.
MST3K: The Brain That Wouldn't Die, 19931030000000 +0000, New guy Mike Nelson finishes his training and makes his way into the theater. His first outing is the movie The Brain That Wouldn't Die

programme.title: Backlot: MST3K 25th Anniversary: Big Changes
programme.desc: Backlot: MST3K 25th Anniversary, S01E15, Part three of the complete history of MST3K takes a look at the changes the series underwent throughout the course of its run, including the host and network shifts.
MST3K: The Brain That Wouldn't Die, 19931030000000 +0000, New guy Mike Nelson finishes his training and makes his way into the theater. His first outing is the movie The Brain That Wouldn't Die
MST3K: Hercules, 19930617000000 +0000, Joel and the Bots have a casual day on the SOL and endure another incoherent Hercules movie (Hercules (1958)).

programme.title: Hercules Unchained
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Hercules Unchained, S04E08, While trying to resolve a quarrel between warring brothers Eteocles and Polynices, Hercules is taken captive by Queen Omphale of Lydia.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: Hired! (Part 2)
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E18, Advance your career by finishing this enlightening two-part short featuring timeless sales advice.

programme.title: Hercules Against the Moon Men
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000, S04E10, A race of evil Moon aliens lands in ancient Greece, wreaking havoc for years on the city of Samar. It’s up to the mighty Hercules to end the chaos.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: Keeping Clean And Neat
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E21, Don't leave the house before watching this indispensable guide to hygiene.

programme.title: Hercules And The Captive Women
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Hercules And The Captive Women, S04E12, The guys face off against Hercules once again as the strong man fights evil Queen Antinea to get his son back in Hercules and the Captive Women.

The Water is Wide, 20060129000000 +0000, During the late 1960s, a novice schoolteacher comes to a small island off the coast of South Carolina with the hope of bringing literacy and self-respect to the undereducated, African-American children living there.
Brush With Fate, 20030202000000 +0000, A teacher regales a new colleague with tales of a Vermeer painting's impact on the lives of its past and present owners. Stars Glenn Close, Ellen Burstyn.
Window Wonderland, 20130101000000 +0000, Hallmark Original Movie. Sloan Van Doren is hoping to take over the head window designer spot.
A Nutcracker Christmas, 20160101000000 +0000, Hallmark Original Movie. A jaded ex-ballerina is forced to come to terms with the life she left behind.
Christmas Festival of Ice, 20170101000000 +0000, Hallmark Original Movie. Emma sets out to save her town's beloved ice sculpture contest.

Christmas in Conway, 20131201000000 +0000, Hoping it will be the perfect Christmas present for his wife (Mary-Louise Parker), a man (Andy Garcia) plans to construct a Ferris wheel in his backyard. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

Breathing Lessons, 19940206000000 +0000, A mature couple, one grounded and realistic and the other flighty and inspired, get lost on a trip that becomes a crazy adventure of twists, turns, shocks and surprises rekindling memories, love and life.
Smart Cookies, 20120818000000 +0000, A high-maintenance realtor forced to do community service must lead a group of hopeless girl scouts in the regional cookie drive competition.

Sandra Brown's White Hot, 20160417000000 +0000, After her younger brother Danny dies, Sayre Hoyle breaks her vow to never return home. But when police discover that Danny's death was a homicide, Sayre is forced to confront her father along with a powder keg of old hatreds.

Duke, 20120428000000 +0000, When war veteran Terry Pulaski's dog Duke becomes ill, Terry seeks anonymous help from a nearby veterinary clinic. It soon becomes a community's quest to reunite Terry with his beloved dog. Stars Steven Weber.

programme.title: Out Of Mind
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S02E22, O'Neill awakens, seemingly from a 79-year cryogenic sleep, to find that his team is long dead. He soon discovers that it's all a setup and he is actually a prisoner of the Goa'uld, who intend to learn all his secrets…and then destroy him!

programme.title: Into The Fire
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E01, Hathor captures O'Neill and implants him with a destructive Goa'uld symbiote that could eventually kill him. Meanwhile, O'Neill's rescue party is defeated by Hathor's invincible energy barrier and time is running out. Is there a way to save O'Neill?

programme.title: Seth
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E02, When SG-1 hunts for a Goa'uld lord living on Earth, they discover this powerful alien in the form of a religious leader with an armed cult following. O'Neill faces off with both government agents and the cult in a clash that may destroy them all.

programme.title: Fair Game
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E03, O'Neill (Richard Dean Anderson) attempts to stop a massive Goa'uld invasion of Earth. But to call off the attack, the Goa'uld lords demand the destruction of the Stargate. O'Neill doesn't fully trust them - but the fate of Earth lies in the balance.

programme.title: Legacy
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E04, A mysterious tablet discovered on a distant planet infects anyone who touches it with a hallucinogen. The remarkable stone infects Teal'c and, before long, the entire team except Hammond. Can Hammond (Don S. Davis) stop it and save SG-1 alone?

programme.title: Learning Curve
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E05, As part of an exchange program with the planet Orban, O'Neill travels to Earth with a girl who possesses incredible technical knowledge. But by the time O'Neill discovers the truth behind the child's superior mind…it may be too late for them all.

programme.title: Point Of View
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E06, Alternate reality versions of Carter (Amanda Tapping) and Kawalsky (Jay Acovone) are found in Area 51. Brought to Stargate Command, they start to deteriorate. However, return to their own reality means death, as their world was invaded by Goa'uld!

programme.title: Deadman Switch
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E07, SG-1 is captured by Aris Boch, a bounty hunter chasing an evil Goa'uld named Kel'tar. He offers them freedom in exchange for their help. They agree, only to find that Kel'tar is, in fact, a Tok'ra, whose capture would endanger countless others.

programme.title: Demons
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E08, On another one of their quests, SG-1 encounters a medieval civilization and frees a woman tied to a stake as a sacrifice to a demon. When the woman is freed, the demon vows to destroy the village unless the SG-1 team is offered up in appeasement.

programme.title: Tracker
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E09, McKay and Ronan volunteer to assist Dr. Jennifer Keller with a medical follow-up away from Atlantis. Later, when the pair return to her, they are surprised to learn that she left earlier but a search of the village turns up no sign of her.

programme.title: First Contact
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E10, Stargate SG-1’s Dr. Daniel Jackson (Michael Shanks) travels to Atlantis when his research suggests that a rebellious Ancient scientist named Janus (Gildart Jackson) may have hidden a secret lab somewhere within the city.

programme.title: The Lost Tribe
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E11, Jackson and McKay have reactivated the Attero device, an ancient machine designed to annihilate the Wraith. In doing so, they discover the reason the device was ultimately abandoned… Meanwhile, Todd continues to hold the Daedalus crew captive.

programme.title: Outsiders
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E12, Col. Sheppard and his team locate Dr. Carson Beckett on an alien planet where he is treating a small group of survivors of the Hoffan plague. But that same evening, a party of Wraith warriors arrives, threatening total annihilation.

programme.title: Inquisition
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E13, A newly formed galactic coalition extends an invitation to Lt. Col. John Sheppard and his team to represent Atlantis at their next meeting. But on arrival, the team is immediately detained and must stand trial for crimes against humanity.

programme.title: The Prodigal
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E14, Atlantis is suddenly plunged into darkness, with only the top tier of the central tower unaffected. As Sheppard and McKay attempt to get to the top level, they discover that a force field has been established to prevent them from gaining access.

programme.title: Remnants
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E15, While Richard Woolsey (Robert Picardo) struggles to keep his position as the leader of Atlantis, and McKay (David Hewlett) and Zelenka (David Nykl) investigate a mysterious find, Sheppard is captured by an old enemy with plans to invade the city.

programme.title: Brain Storm
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E16, When the Atlantis team is given two weeks of vacation leave, Dr. Rodney McKay reluctantly accepts an invitation by his former rival, Malcolm Tunney, to attend a scientific demonstration that he claims will be the solution to global warming.

programme.title: With This Ring
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S07E19, Brandon and Kelly each confess their feelings to friends, but expect the other person to make a move. Donna tries to reconcile with David. Steve and Clare double date with Ryan and his girlfriend.

programme.title: A Ripe Young Age
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S07E20, Donna and David visit her grandmother in San Luis Obispo. Noting a striking resemblance between David and her late husband, Mrs. Martin tells the couple about her romance with Donna's grandfather.

programme.title: Storm Warnings
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S07E21, Joey returns to the beach apartment. Rob irritates his manager by seeking Val's advice about whether to sign on for a new movie. Jim and Cindy invite Brandon to spend spring vacation in Hong Kong.

programme.title: Spring Breakdown
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S07E22, Brandon and Tracy visit Jim in Hong Kong; Cindy is in London helping Brenda cope with mononucleosis. Clare and Steve encourage Kelly to go out instead of moping around the apartment.

programme.title: Heaven Sent
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S07E23, Mariah comes to town to give a lecture at the university's new age festival. She develops an instant connection with Kelly, prompting Tracy to bristle. David tries to plan a special evening for Donna.

programme.title: All That Jazz
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S07E26, Brandon has to take care of Kelly and Valerie, who are both laid up with the flu. The girls discuss the reasons for their feud.

programme.title: Mother's Day
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S07E27, Kelly learns that she is pregnant. Val makes a pass at David, prompting Donna to order him to end their working relationship. Clare is saddened by Mother's Day, so Steve tries to take her mind off things by going for a drive.

programme.title: The Way We Weren't
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S08E04, Brandon is heartbroken when Kelly is unable to remember their relationship. Valerie helps organize Donna when she has trouble keeping track of her clients. Donna decides to make Val her business partner.

programme.title: Coming Home
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S08E05, Kelly moves back into the beach apartment. A designer offers to purchase Donna's work. David manages a rock band and allows the lead singer to crash at the apartment.

programme.title: The Right Thing
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S08E06, Brandon and Donna discover that Rush owns the building that houses the sweatshop. David's credit problems escalate. Kelly fails to identify the shooter from the police lineup.

programme.title: Pride And Prejudice
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S08E07, Brandon's overprotection alienates Kelly; Donna learns she's been stabbed in the back by Valerie, who juggles her rich man and her poor man on a dinner cruise attended by Steve and Carly.

programme.title: Child Of The Night
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S08E10, Erica is arrested for prostitution and released into Kelly and Brandon's custody. Jodi claims that Steve is the only man who could have possibly fathered her child. Mel helps David file for bankruptcy and pay back Donna.

programme.title: Deadline
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S08E11, Brandon is arrested for obstructing justice. David moves into the office at the After Dark and accidentally starts a fire. Valerie visits Sands and learns that Noah paid off David's debt.

programme.title: Friends In Deed
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S08E12, Dr. Monahan's behavior unnerves Kelly as he checks out her injured shoulder. Valerie warns Noah that he may be in over his head trying to manage the After Dark.

programme.title: Comic Relief
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S08E13, Dr. Monahan makes inappropriate advances toward Kelly. David and Valerie proceed with their plan to make their exes jealous. Steve performs at the After Dark's comedy showcase.

programme.title: Santa Knows
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S08E14, Kelly considers filing sexual harassment charges against Monahan, but does not want to interfere with a fundraiser for the clinic. Val and David realize how much they mean to each other.

programme.title: Ready Or Not
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S08E15, Dr. Monahan forces Kelly out of the clinic. Brandon and Steve hire a new assistant, Janet Sosna; and bring David aboard as a music reviewer. Valerie cuts a deal with a bookie operating at the After Dark.

programme.title: Glass Cut Teen/Psychic Cop
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E308, A teenager is seriously injured at home. A patrol car crashes during a high-speed pursuit.

programme.title: Australian Balloon/Dr.’s Hay Crush, Part 1
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E311, A hot air balloon is swept 25 miles out to sea by high winds. A man is injured while trying to move a bail of hay with his tractor.

programme.title: Trading Places/Mystery Dispatch
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E334, A 73-year-old Vermont resident is held at knifepoint by an escaped prisoner. Virginia emergency workers receive an unusual call.

programme.title: Motel Hostage/Endometriosis Mom
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E314, Police pursue two men who robbed a motel. A 4-year-old girl calls 911 when her mother becomes unconscious.

programme.title: Pontoon Boat/Canteen Tongue
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E349, A boy is thrown into the water when the boat he's riding in hits a wave. A 9-year old boy is injured when he sticks his tongue where it doesn't belong.

programme.title: Deck Trapped Kid/Hamburger
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E383, Three boys are injured while playing on the deck of an abandoned house. The manager of a fast-food restaurant is shot by a gunman.

programme.title: Wave Runner, Part 2/Armed Robbery
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E307, A teenager is injured when he's hit in the head by a waterski. A convenience store employee is robbed at gunpoint.

programme.title: Feed Bin Boy/Rescuers Rescue
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E200, A woman discovers her 3 years old foot stick out of the cow's feed bin. Ambulance skids out of control on way to accident.

programme.title: Choc. Chip/He’s Not an Officer
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E122, 16 year old has an allergic reaction and stops breathing/Fake officer pulls over woman.

programme.title: Have Gun/Baby on Board
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E310, A pastor calls 911 to report a burglar in his home. A toddler is accidentally shot after finding a gun.

programme.title: Motel Toddler/Bike Boy
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E127, Toddler falls out window into pond / Boy scout hit by a car while riding bike.

programme.title: Brush Fire/Mule Pull Cardiac
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E362, Two volunteer firefighters respond to a brush fire. A man collapses during a Vermont State Fair contest.

programme.title: Send in the Clowns/Dirt Bike Boy
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E319, A circus clown collapses backstage and stops breathing. A boy is injured while riding his dirt bike.

programme.title: White Eagle/Ando the Dog
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E128, Vicki White Eagle has a car accident and becomes impaled by a piece of fence/A hit and run accident escalates.

programme.title: Brain Hemmorage/Bear
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E150, A woman suffers from a brain hemorrhage while home alone with young children. Police and rescue try to track down a bear in Albuquerque.

programme.title: Mud Trap/Prison EMTs, Part 1
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E321, Two teenaged girls are injured when their car is struck by a reckless driver. A prison inmate fakes an illness and hijacks an ambulance.

programme.title: Brittany’s Call/Garage Door
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E355, A 7-year-old calls 911 when she's unable to awaken her father. A 5-year-old is pinned by an automatic closing garage door.

programme.title: MOTHER'S DAY FLOOD/ROLLERBLADE
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E323, Two women are trapped by a roaring flash flood. A boy rollerblading is hit by a truck.

programme.title: Texas Pool Tot/Bank Rob Rec
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E118, 2 yr. old found face down in swimming pool / Bank robber

programme.title: Helicopter Horse/Kids in Smoke
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E251, A horse loses its footing and throws a rider off 300 feet down onto a ledge. A 12-year-old babysitter notices black smoke.
